welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yamoussoukro, the charming capital city of Côte d’Ivoire! Known for its stunning Basilica of Our Lady of Peace, we invite you to explore and enjoy the city's rich history, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality. Have a wonderful time here!
